**Profile Summary**

---

**Name:** Jung Sun  
**Rank:** Command Sergeant Major  
**Unit:** Missile Force Command  
**LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/jung-sun-004](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jung-sun-004)

**Description:**  
Jung Sun is a dedicated and disciplined Command Sergeant Major serving in the North Korean Army's Missile Force Command. With a robust background in tactical operations and specialized research, Jung Sun has consistently demonstrated loyalty, tactical prowess, and an unwavering commitment to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK).

**Achievements:**
- **Specialized Tactical Research Projects:** Played a key role in assisting and executing advanced research initiatives aimed at enhancing missile technology and strategic defense mechanisms.
- **Leadership Excellence:** Effectively led and mentored junior soldiers, fostering a culture of discipline and excellence within the unit.
- **Operational Successes:** Successfully coordinated multiple missions ensuring the operational readiness and effectiveness of the Missile Force Command.

**Career Aspirations:**  
Inspired by technology influencers such as Samantha Briasco-Stewart on Twitch, Jung Sun aspires to transition from a military career to a role within the National Security Agency (NSA). Motivated by the prospect of fewer athletic engagements, Jung Sun seeks to fully dedicate efforts toward technological innovation and cybersecurity. This ambition reflects a strong desire to leverage technical skills in a civilian capacity, contributing to national security from a different vantage point.

**Skills:**
- Advanced tactical planning and execution
- Expertise in missile technology and defense systems
- Strong leadership and team management
- Proficient in cybersecurity fundamentals
- Adaptability to new technological environments

**Education & Training:**
- Comprehensive military training in missile operations and strategic defense
- Ongoing self-education in information technology and cybersecurity through online platforms like Twitch
